mapper.select: select * from report r join dept d on r.deptid=d.deptid join userdetail u on r.detailld=u.detailId join Krar k on k.rid=r.rid where r.rtype=#{rtype}
select * from report r join dept d on r.deptid=d.deptid join userdetail u on r.detailld=u.detailId join Krar k on k.rid=r.rid
select * from report r join dept d on r.deptid=d.deptid join userdetail u on r.detailld=u.detailId join Krar k on k.rid=r.rid
mapper.insert: insert into reportser(rid,renames) VALUES ((select MAX(rid) from report),#{renames})
insert into Krar(rid,kname) VALUES ((select MAX(rid) from report),#{kname})
